## Test MapGL

Load libraries

```{r}

if(!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(
  mapgl
)
```

Mapbox : MapGL Visualization

```{r}

mapgl::mapboxgl()
```

```{r}
mapboxgl(
  style = mapbox_style("satellite"),
  projection = "winkelTripel")
```

```{r}
mapboxgl(
  center = c(-97.6, 25.4)
) |> 
  fly_to(
    center = c(-96.810481, 32.790869),
    zoom = 18.4,
    pitch = 75,
    bearing = 136.8
  )
```

```{r}
m1 <- mapboxgl()
m2 <- mapboxgl(mapbox_style("satellite-streets"))

compare(m1, m2)
```
